nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Brick Adventures: Awesome Jedi Tales

LEGO Star Wars: Brick Adventures Awesome Jedi Adventures is a young readers book that is a compilation of LEGO Star Wars: Brick Adventures 1: Stormtrooper Class Clowns and LEGO Star Wars: Brick Adventures 2: Jedi Master Class written by Ace Landers. It was published by Scholastic Inc. on September 1, 2019. It is packaged with a Mace Windu minifigure.
An epic collection of LEGO Star Wars stories PLUS buildable Mace Windu minifigure!

Blast into hyperspace in this journey through the Star Wars universe. With six stories starring the galaxy's greatest heroes (and villains) - from Anakin Skywalker to Rey and Kylo Ren, this collection has it all!
LEGO Brick Adventures are funny, easy-to-read, full-colour stories.
